column4: I had two actually. the latest was if anyone knows how to disable the drum sound in 9.10 at the login screen. I have checked everything... sound, login screen...
drum sound?  is that kde iirc?
No, it's the ubuntu login screen. (I have gnome & XFCE installed)
it does it when the login screen comes up. doesn't seem to be associated with gnome, xfce, or any other window manager
